Ms To Drop Vj

02 Dec 1999

Tired of fighting with Sun about its rights to use the Java programming language the way it sees fit, Microsoft is reported to be dropping Visual J++ 6.0 and according to MS sources, dropping VJ++ from the next release of Visual Studio 7 which is due out next year.
